hints.content:
We can use the related multiplication equation to help us.

$\goldE{53} \div \blueE{8} = \maroonE{{?}}$

So, $\blueE{8} \times \maroonE{{?}}= \goldE{53}$.

No whole number value of $\maroonE{{?}}$ makes the equation exactly true. 

Let's try different values of $\maroonE{?}$ to get close to a product of $\goldE{53}$.

$\begin{align}
\blueE{8} \times \maroonE{6} &= 48 \\\\
\blueE{8} \times \maroonE{7} &= 56 \\\\
\blueE{8} \times \maroonE{8} &= 64
\end{align}$

Which two values of $\maroonE{?}$ get us the closest to $\goldE{53}$?
The total $\goldE{53}$ is between $48$ and $56$, so $\maroonE{?}$ is between $\maroonE{6}$ and $\maroonE{7}$.

The point that represents $\goldE{53} \div \blueE{8}$ is between $\maroonE{6}$ and $\maroonE{7}$.

[[☃ image 1]]

[[☃ explanation 1]]

options.explanation:
[[☃ image 1]]

It takes more than $\maroonE{6}$ rows of $\blueE{8}$, but less than $\maroonE{7}$ full rows of $\blueE{8}$ to equal $\goldE{53}$.
options.showPrompt: Please show me a picture of what this means.

options.alt: An array of 53 circles arranged in 6 rows of 8 circles each and 1 row with 5 circles.
A number line from 5 to 10, with a tick every 1 unit. A point is labeled between the tick mark labeled 6 and the tick mark labeled 7. !

question.content:
The following quotient is between two whole numbers.

$53 \div 8$

**Which point on the number line could represent the quotient?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A number line from 5 to 10, with a tick every 1 unit. A point is labeled between the tick mark labeled 5 and the tick mark labeled 6.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/6775f92ccb2436968ec1bdf9a73b22178977ec2d)

![A number line from 5 to 10, with a tick every 1 unit. A point is labeled between the tick mark labeled 6 and the tick mark labeled 7.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/fcbe618e2f4091ce0929f5e1ad2409f2fd8ae59f)

![A number line from 5 to 10, with a tick every 1 unit. A point is labeled between the tick mark labeled 7 and the tick mark labeled 8.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/7ba4f0c0e9bdb92d96352c244296fd3d484f957a)
